titles.title: Equity in STD Testing Act
Equity in STD Testing Act
To require the coverage of testing for certain sexually transmitted infections without the imposition of cost sharing, and for other purposes.

bill.summary:
Equity in STD Testing Act
This bill provides for coverage, without cost-sharing, of testing for certain sexually transmitted diseases under Medicare Advantage, Medicaid, the Children's Health Insurance Program (CHIP), TRICARE, Department of Veterans Affairs health benefits, and the Indian Health Service.
